alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 8:23PM CDT until April 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Rock Island, Henry IL and Whiteside Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River at Moline affecting Rock Island and Henry IL Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.7 feet, Water affects Barstow Road between Barstow and Osborn. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
